name: Just Run!
description: I made this in a matter of hours. I understand this game is bad! I AM SORRY!!! Anyway, you play as a cherecachure named Fred, (bot dats unimportant) and you are dodging Emenys that want to hart u. Yur mission is to got the HAPPY SMILEY FACE to gain its happiness! Also when playing dis game, plz don't try to leave it, it gets med
